informal_statement:
Show that for positive integers $n$ and $k$ with $k \leq n$, we have 
$\binom{n}{k} = \binom{n-1}{k} + \binom{n-1}{k-1}$.
formal_statement:
theorem numbertheory_nckeqnm1ckpnm1ckm1:
  fixes n k ::nat
  assumes "0 < n \<and> 0 < k"
    and "k \<le> n" 
  shows "n choose k =  (n - 1) choose k + (n - 1) choose (k - 1)"
formal_code:
